comment._content:
A 1967 photo from the Prospect Park Handbook (http://www.echonyc.com/~parks/books/handbook.html) suggests this location is "Concert Grove, The Terrace" on the eastern side of the park.
40.658451,-73.964746 from Google maps (? there's more tree cover on the Google map than Yahoo)

comment._content: On June 23, 2011, kenlohere suggested where this photo was taken; thank you for your efforts to #mapBK!
